title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.11.4 发布
author: ff98sha
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ff98sha 于 2019-5-24 09:12 编辑 

Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。

Fixes:
修复：
Fixed several crashes on Nintendo Switch that could occur during gameplay, especially surrounding villager job site blocks修复了Nintendo Switch上几个游戏过程中的崩溃，尤其当玩家在村民工作方块附近时Fixed issues with Marketplace maps so 'villager_v2' works in command selectors again, targeting both V1 and V2 villagers修复了商城的地图，使得“villager_v2”在命令选择器中也能使用，现在能选中v1和v2的村民


Additional Fixes from 1.11.3:
Nintendo Switch players also receive the following fixes from version 1.11.3:
1.11.3的额外漏洞修复
Nintendo Switch玩家会收到1.11.3的额外漏洞修复：


http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-866445-1-1.html
Fixed a crash that could occur when mobs found the nearest attackable mob修复了怪物在找到最近可攻击的生物时的崩溃When converting from V1 to V2, villagers now keep their XP level当村民从v1转换为v2时，村民会保持其经验等级Villagers cured of zombification can no longer change their profession if they have enough XP (MCPE-42348)村民从僵尸化中痊愈时，如果没有足够经验，就不再会改变其职业（MCPE-42348）Another fix for villagers changing their professions when they're not supposed to修复了村民在不应该改变职业时改变的漏洞Fixed pathfinding so when an entity can't float, swim, or be amphibious, it can still walk at the bottom of water修复了实体的寻路机制，使得其在不能飘浮、游泳或不是水陆两栖时仍能在水底行走Fixed gamertags and gamerpics of Realms members not appearing on the members list修复了Realm成员的玩家标签和头像不在成员列表显示的漏洞The Realms members list no longer returns to the first page when navigating to another pageRealm成员列表在跳转到其他页时不再返回到首页When using commands, the villager and zombie_villager target selectors now target both V1 and V2 mob types使用命令时，villager和zombie_villager的目标选择器对v1和v2型村民同时起效



正版地址Google Playhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Storehttps://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/9nblggh2jhxj

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
